Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: the beginning consists of an episodic account of Miyazawa’s childhood (and very unhappy youth), while the middle is made up of the various stories featured in his poems.
